column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////The Bone Marrow and Beet Salad come. I love bone marrow
column2: and my husband will partake in a bite
column4: he squished his nose in dislike. I then ate a few scoops and it was the worst tasting marrow I have ever had. Maybe my oysters had hepatitis and my cow had mad cow disease. Either way
column5: they were awful (but I was famished and used the great jelly to mask the flavor). The beets were too thinly sliced
column6: not a good chunky beet--lacking flavor for his salad (his complaint not mine).
